definition[0]: a picture or writing that is permanently marked on your skin using a needle and ink
example[0]: He has a tattoo of a snake on his left arm.
definition[1]: an outdoor military show with music, usually at night
definition[2]: a fast continuous beating of a drum, or a sound like this
definition[3]: to mark a permanent picture or writing on someone’s skin with a needle and ink
example[1]: She’s got a heart tattooed on her right shoulder.
